FuncDef: This command specifies the directly connected next hop IP address or interface used to reach the destination. If the next hop is over an unnumbered interface or a point-to-point interface, theip-int-nameof the unnumbered or point-to-point interface (on this node) can be configured.

ParaDef.Info: the IP-INT, IPv4, and IPv6 addresses. Values-The following values apply to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS:.
